text: 所有的快乐，哀伤，痛苦，都会随时间逝去。

title: Two Sum
text: Two Sum给定一个整形元素组成的数组，给出一个数，求数组中是否存在两个数之和与给定数相等。不能使用同一个元素两次，同时一定会有一个解。 Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. Example: Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target = 9, Because nums[0] + nums[1] = 2 + 7 = 9,return [0, 1]. 弱智解法：12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637package com.company;public class Main { public static void main(String[] args) { // write your code here int nums3[] = {3, 2, 4}; int target3 = 6; int nums4[] = {2,7,11,15}; int target4 = 9; int twoSum[] = Solution.twoSum(nums3, target3); System.out.print(twoSum[0] + " " + twoSum[1]); System.out.println(" finish"); }}class Solution { public static int[] twoSum(int[] nums, int target) { int flag = 0; int array[] = {0,0}; for(int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) { if(flag == 1) { break; } for(int j = i + 1; j < nums.length; j++) { if((nums[i] + nums[j] == target)) { array[0] = i; array[1] = j; flag = 1; break; } } } return array; }}
